page.title: 07SHOPPING IN SUTTON ST JAMES
page.content: Although the village is not very large, we have quite a lot of shopping facilities. There is a general store which sells almost everything you can think of, including groceries, greengrocery, hardware, some clothing, and alcohol. If what you need is not there, the owner will order it for you.We also have a butcher who sells tins and packets as well as meat.Children can buy crisps there. The Post Office is small and sells stationery and some craft items. You have to go to Holbeach or Long Sutton if you want something important like road tax. We also have a garage, a pub, a hairdresser, and two chip vans call twice a week and park on the village green.For more important things you have to go to Wisbech or Peterborough.
